title: Iron Kite
text:
Iron Kite (铁风筝 tie fengzheng) are a Chinese <a href="heavy%20metal%20music">heavy metal</a> rock group.
They first gained attention with songs on compilations: Zhe ge xiatian 这个夏天 (that summer) on <a href="China%20Fire%20II">China Fire II</a> and "Evolution Day" (进化之日) on <a href="China%20Fire%20III">China Fire III</a>.
